definition[0]: to begin to experience or do something, or begin to be in a particular state
example[0]: I lay down and went to sleep.
example[1]: Britain and Germany went to war in 1939.
definition[1]: to be given to someone or something
example[2]: All the money raised will go to local charities.
definition[2]: the go-to person is someone who people always ask for help with a particular problem, because of their great skill or knowledge
example[3]: He's the go-to guy for questions about spreadsheets.
